title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Theory-Based Decision-Making and Self-Efficacy Enhancement for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and clinical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can make decisions with over 80% accuracy in high-risk patient scenarios based on the ADD-SEM model.
Learners achieve a score improvement of at least 2 points on a self-efficacy measurement scale (10-point scale) after completing the course.
Learners can apply a 3-step crisis management protocol for patient safety to real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
